title: On the Lookout
description: A fire lookout is a very important job that requires a special type of person. In On the Lookout, students will read an interview with a fire lookout who explains what life in a lookout tower is like and what he does to help keep firefighters safe and to protect the environment. This book can be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose and how to identify combined sentences.
highFrequencyWords: alert, climate, damage, ecosystem, environment, humidity, jarring, lookouts, remote
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Long Vowels : Recognize long vowel i words
awareness: Combined Sentences                : Identify and use combined sentences
phonics: Content Vocabulary                : Understand and use content vocabulary
